verses.roman:
badhnītemaṁ durvinītaṁ
kiṁ kariṣyanti vṛṣṇayaḥ
ye 'smat-prasādopacitāṁ
dattāṁ no bhuñjate mahīm

synonyms: badhnīta—arrest; imam—him; durvinītam—ill-behaved; kim—what; kariṣyanti—will they do; vṛṣṇayaḥ—the Vṛṣṇis; ye—who; asmat—of us; prasāda—by the grace; upacitām—acquired; dattām—bestowed; naḥ—our; bhuñjate—are enjoying; mahīm—the land.
translation: Arrest this ill-behaved Sāmba! What will the Vṛṣṇis do? By our grace they are ruling land that we have granted them.
